Records of the Office of the Dean, University College of Arts and Science (Archibald L. Bouton)
Series II: Lecture Notes, Writings, Addresses, and Publications
Series II: Lecture Notes, Writings, Addresses, and Publications
Lecture Notes, 1899-1915; Writings, Addresses, and Publications, 1909-1941, is a chronological file consisting of fragments of lectures, exam questions, and course outlines.
